name: todoist_scrape_project
description: Scrape a Todoist project by its numeric ID. Returns tasks with titles, due dates, priorities, and labels. Find the project ID from the URL when viewing a project (e.g. app.todoist.com/app/project/2349078265). Requires login.

parameters.name: project_id
parameters.description: Numeric project ID from the Todoist URL (e.g. '2349078265')

steps.code: const projectName = document.querySelector('h1, [class*="project_name"], [data-testid="project-name"], header [class*="title"]')?.textContent?.trim() || ''; const tasks = Array.from(document.querySelectorAll('.task_list_item, [data-testid="task"]')).slice(0,50).map(el => { const title = el.querySelector('.task_content, [data-testid="task-name"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const due = el.querySelector('.date, time, [class*="due"]')?.textContent?.trim()||''; const priority = el.querySelector('[class*="priority"]')?.className?.match(/priority_(\d)/)?.[1]||''; const labels = Array.from(el.querySelectorAll('[class*="label"], .tag')).map(l=>l.textContent.trim()); return { title, due_date: due, priority, labels }; }).filter(t=>t.title); return { project_id: '{{project_id}}', project_name: projectName, tasks }
steps.name: page_data
steps.label: Extract data
